security: Disclosing the criteria for and granting of security clearances may compromise the integrity of personnel vetting processes. Quoting from the document: “MR. JOSEPH F. PEARSON CLEARED FOR TYPE A CONTRACT EMPLOYMENT 4 DEC 63.”
summary: A cable indicates that Mr. Joseph F. Pearson has been cleared for Type A contract employment as of December 4, 1963.
summary_one_paragraph: This SECRET cable, dated December 4, 1963, from SIG CEN to JUWAVE, with information copies to SAS/A, DOP, OP. 2, OS 2, and VR, states that Mr. Joseph F. Pearson has been cleared for Type A contract employment. A comment from SAS requests advice regarding the clearance subject, referencing WAVE-8461.
title: Joseph F. Pearson Cleared for Type A Contract Employment
